title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Translation (1 point):

Possible translations are:

  • immemores: unmindful/not mindful/mindless/heedless/unheeding/forgetful/forgetting/not remembering/not thinking/oblivious

  • fuore: by/from/with/due to/because of madness/insanity/fury/rage/frenzy/anger

  • caeci: blind/blinded/unseeing

  • -que: and

Identification (1 point): ablative of means/instrument/cause
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.
